Reviews.Title: Everything I expected and more
Reviews.Author: Mike
Reviews.Content: Since there is no real review for this TV here, I'll give it a go.Picture is great right out of the box in my opinion. I didnt have to adjust any really at all. Just set it in game mode, plugged it into my computer and ran with it.Sound is pretty much standard to me, but I'm not an audiophile. It isn't blowing me away cause its amazing but it is not bad at all.I was also leery about ordering a tv online with the shipping, so I overnighted it. It was shipped well and came in one puece without damage. So that made me happy. Only really bad part about it is I had to put the stand together, and thats kinda reaching for something since it took longer to find a screwdriver then put the stand together.

Reviews.Title: Awesome Smart HdTv
Reviews.Author: ALDO
Reviews.Content: $350.at Wal-Mart...very nice SMART TV. ALL THE BELLS AND WHISTLES. WIRELESS ACCESS TO ALL MY TOYS AND NETFLIX, HULU PLUS AND VUDU ETC..

Reviews.Title: Best price?????
Reviews.Author: larry hill
Reviews.Content: For this price I can go into almost any store and buy this item for a bit better price and carry it home right away.  Example, TARGET has a Phillips 40" LED with all features plus WI/FI connect to TV for about $379.00.  Also that store is less than 2 miles from my house.  Question why buy your product?  L.Hill

ProductInfo.Features:
Full 1080p HD display, with a 1920x1080p resolution
SRS TruSurround XT sound performance for unmatched audio
Seamless connectivity with 3 HDMI inputs and Easylink
USB for fantastic multimedia playback
Energy Star rated for low power consumption
ProductInfo.Name: Philips 39PFL2708/F7 39-Inch 1080p 60Hz LED HDTV (Black)
